CustomAI.title: OTP & Authentication
CustomAI.content: Secure, time-sensitive one-time passwords for account verification and secure transactions. Enjoy high security with encryption, reducing the risk of fraud.

CustomAI.title: Transactional SMS
CustomAI.content: Automated messages triggered by customer interactions such as order confirmations, shipping details, and account notifications. These messages are personalized and sent in real time to maintain high engagement.

CustomAI.title: Promotional SMS
CustomAI.content: Engage your audience with targeted campaigns. Customize your messages using variables (like customer names) to make each communication personal.

CustomAI.title: Outbound Dialing
CustomAI.content: Deliver pre-recorded voice messages quickly and reliably. Ideal for marketing  campaigns, alerts, and notifications.

CustomAI.title: IVR Telephony
CustomAI.content: Provide a self-service option for customers with an Interactive Voice Response  system that routes calls efficiently and gathers necessary information.

CustomAI.title: Missed Call Alerts
CustomAI.content: Ensure no opportunity is lost by converting missed calls into actionable leads with  immediate follow-ups.

AIPowered.title: Transactional Emails
AIPowered.content: Automatically triggered emails for activities such as password resets, invoices, and  account alerts. These emails are fully encrypted and designed to build trust and  reliability

AIPowered.title: Promotional Email
AIPowered.content: Creative, visually engaging emails designed to capture attention and drive  conversions. Utilize rich media, personalized content, and clear CTAs to boost  engagement.

AutomatedAI.title: Outbound Dialing
AutomatedAI.content: Deliver pre-recorded voice messages quickly and reliably. Ideal for marketing  campaigns, alerts, and notifications.

AutomatedAI.title: Customer Support Automation
AutomatedAI.content: Enhance customer support with AI-powered chatbots and virtual assistants that provide 24/7 service, reducing response times and improving satisfaction.

AutomatedAI.title: Multichannel Support
AutomatedAI.content: Provide consistent support across multiple channels including web, mobile, and social media platforms.
